name: Fimi Market Inc.
description: Fimi Market Inc. is an upcoming multi-chain NFT Marketplace launching mid-late Q1 2022. Minting chains at launch will be Stellar, Ethereum, Ploygon, and Binance Smart Chain. Fimi is a Jamaican word which means "for me.‚Äù We believe that everyone has the right to participate, create, buy, sell, but most importantly to thrive. Our mission is to provide artists from all walks of life an avenue to showcase their work. $FIMI is the low supply (32,000,000) token built on the Stellar Network that will serve as the utility token of the platform. Holders will have voting rights on featured content and collections, mint free on stellar, enjoy reduced sales fees on work minted on other blockchains, and have early access to Fimi Market exclusive collections and items.
